mapper.insert: INSERT INTO roasteries (name, logo_url, website_url, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{roastery.name}, #{roastery.logoUrl}, #{roastery.websiteUrl}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE roasteries SET name = #{roastery.name}, logo_url = #{roastery.logoUrl}, website_url = #{roastery.websiteUrl}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{roastery.id}
